titles.title: Show mercy to us, loving Father

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Show mercy to us, loving Father.
We have sinned against you.
Please make us anew.
In your love and your grace You redeem us

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, have mercy.
Lord, have mercy (echo)
Lord, have mercy
Lord, have mercy (echo)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Look not on our failings, Lord Jesus.
We have sinned against you.
Please make us anew.
By your life and your death, you redeem us.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Christ, have mercy.
Christ, have mercy (echo)
Christ, have mercy.
Christ, have mercy (echo)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Come, fill our hearts, Holy Spirit,
We have sinned against you.
Please make us anew.
Forgive us and heal us and save us.

verse.lines:
